caption.p: HE staining images of cross-sections of granulation tissues obtained at 7 days postwounding. (a, d) Vehicle-treated group; (b, e) CCLE 10 mg/kg/d-treated group; (c, f) CCLE 50 mg/kg/d-treated group. s: scab; e: epidermis; blue ellipses: fibroblasts; yellow ellipses: inflammatory cells; red ellipses: blood vessels.
